column4: if I install the 64bit version of ubuntu will some applications not work? or will they just run in 32bit mode? I am new to ubuntu so if there will be alot of problems with the 64bit version I probaly go with the 32bit version. But would be nice to use my full 4gb of ram and use my cpu to the max.
i haven't seen anything that wouldn't work in windows or linux while iw been using 64bit

Ok, as for windows I use 64bit and the thing it does it has to differenct Program Files directories , one for the 32bit and one for the 64bit but I have no idea how ubuntu handles it. but if you have had luck then I will take a chance aswell =)
